text: We collect usage information about You including the webpages You visit, what You click on, the actions You perform, via tools such as Google Analytics or such other tools whenever You interact with our website and/ or service.

Privacy Policy

Information from third parties and integration partners: We collect your Personally Identifiable Information or data from third parties if You give permission to those third parties to share your information with Us or where You have made that information publicly available online.
We collect information from the device and application You use to access Our services.

We may use first party cookies (small text files that Our websites store/s locally on your computer) on Our websites, for one or more of the following purposes: to help identify unique and returning visitors and/or devices; conduct A/B testing; or diagnose problems with Our servers.

Additionally, Leadfeeder places first-party cookies for providing transparency on how Our visitors use Our website and the tool processes domains from provided form inputs (e.g. "leadfeeder.com") to correlate IP addresses with companies and to enhance its services.
During such registration, We collect your first and last name (together called as full name), username, password and email address.

text: Referral information: If You arrive at an Entropik Technologies website from an external source (such as a link on another website or in an email), We record information about the source that referred you to Us.
